original_text: At that time Merodach-baladan the son of Baladan, king of Babylon, sent envoys with letters and a present to Hezekiah, for he heard that Hezekiah had been sick.
korean_text: 그 때에 발라단의 아들 바벨론의 왕 브로닥발라단이 히스기야가 병 들었다 함을 듣고 편지와 예물을 그에게 보낸지라

sentences.original_text: Merodach-baladan the son of Baladan, king of Babylon,
sent envoys with letters and a present to Hezekiah,
sentences.korean_translation: 사절과 편지 및 예물을 히스기야에게 보내었으니

sentences.original_text: for he heard that Hezekiah had been sick.
